column4: Why are there (edu)(x)(k)ubuntu versions of ubuntu which only differ in certain packages ? If Microsoft would go that way them clients would be getting 'WOFFICE' (windows office) and 'WEMAIL' (windows email) versions :)
to keep the installer under 700mb while still offereing different desktop environtments
keep in mind, there is very little on a windows install disk compared toa  linux one.  windows comes with practically no applications
Terrasque indeed , you're both making a point.
